reviews.reviewBody: Classic, almost as if I was in France, except I think it'smore dense. But it's a always great pleasure and emotion to eat it.

additionalProperty.name: light_or_dense
additionalProperty.valueReference: -2 is for very light, -1 for light, 0 for medium, 1 for dense, 2 for very dense

additionalProperty.name: flaky_or_brioche
additionalProperty.valueReference: -2 is for very brioche, -1 for brioche, 0 for medium, 1 for flaky, 2 for very flaky

additionalProperty.name: buttery
additionalProperty.valueReference: -2 is for not buttery at all, -1 for not buttery, 0 for medium, 1 for buttery, 2 for very buttery

additionalProperty.name: golden_or_pale
additionalProperty.valueReference: -2 is for very golden, -1 for golden, 0 for medium, 1 for pale, 2 for very pale

additionalProperty.name: crispy_or_soft
additionalProperty.valueReference: -2 is for very crispy, -1 for crispy, 0 for medium, 1 for soft, 2 for very soft

additionalProperty.name: big_or_small
additionalProperty.valueReference: -2 for very small, -1 for small, 0 for medium, 1 for big, 2 for very big

additionalProperty.name: chocolate_disposition
additionalProperty.valueReference: -2 for superimposed, -1 for stuck side by side, 0 for well distributed, 1 for too far away, 2 for on the edges

additionalProperty.name: good_or_not_good
additionalProperty.valueReference: -2 for not good at all, -1 for not good, 0 for medium, 1 for good, 2 for very good
